summary: CIA Director (1953-1961) - architect of covert operations and Cold War intelligence apparatus
key_facts: OSS station chief Switzerland WWII - Nazi surrender negotiations
CIA Director under Eisenhower: MK-Ultra approval, coup operations
Fired by JFK after Bay of Pigs failure (1961)
Warren Commission member investigating JFK assassination
concealment: Corporate law background shielded early operations, destroyed records (MK-Ultra)
